column4: if I have no sound in flash what do i do? libflashsupport installed
I think what you may actually want is to enable multiverse then look in synaptic for Package flashplugin-nonfree
I think what you installed is the libflash-mozilla plugin which is the one that lets mozilla use flash
just make sure to go into software sources and enable multiverse
same thing should i restart?
did you close out firefox and restart it
yes
Which site are you having the issue with?
youtube
Do you have sound on other flash sites?
same problem with the other ones
can you go into your system- preferences sound- and then test all the sound channels to make sure you have sound in all of them
only music and movies work
try some of the other playback for sound playback-- see if it can get it make sound through them- THat is probably why you hear no sound using flash
it works ALSA
Now try you-tube
same problem
Question? do you have onboard sound plus a seperate sound card?
just the one on motherboard btw i just tested in opera and it worked but not in firefox
Then install the  libflash-mozplugin (you have to have both installed)
it worked
ty
I think you had the moz plugin without having flash
